description.value:
Requirement You are under the effect of a meditation spell.

You perform the following as you Sustain your Meditation.

Your world moves faster, while the world others see is simply slower. Target a creature within 30 feet of you, which can include yourself. As you perform a series of occult gestures to pull the strands of time in your favor, your target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} for 1 Round; it can only use this extra action to Strike. This is a Flourish and Manipulate effect.
